item.title: 风险气候武器的时代可能已经到来
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列报道 Primer的这一集中，我们访问了使用地球工程技术为全球变暖寻找银弹的初创公司。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Primer, we visit the startups using geoengineering to find a silver bullet for global warming.

】

item.title: 美国盟友对特朗普关税政策的转变表示欣慰和蔑视
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在最后一刻决定暂停征收一些最激进的关税，全球的贸易伙伴对此既感到欣慰，又感到困惑。【原文：America’s trading partners around the globe reacted with a mixture of relief and bewilderment to President Donald Trump’s eleventh-hour decision to pause some of his most aggressive tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普为何暂停关税，90 天后会发生什么？
item.description: 几周来，唐纳德-特朗普总统一直在推进对进口商品征收新的高额关税的计划，尽管有人警告说这一政策可能会引发经济混乱。4 月 9 日，在全球股市连续多日暴跌之后，他改变了方向。【原文：For weeks, President Donald Trump has plowed ahead with plans to impose steep new tariffs on imports despite warnings that the policy could trigger economic chaos. On April 9, after a multiday plunge in global stock markets, he changed course.】

item.title: 美国通胀在关税影响前意外降温
item.description: 美国 3 月份的基本通胀广泛降温，这表明在广泛征收关税之前，消费者得到了一定程度的宽松，而关税有可能加剧价格压力。【原文：Underlying US inflation cooled broadly in March, indicating some relief for consumers prior to widespread tariffs that risk contributing to price pressures.】

item.title: OPPO 新款 Ultra 手机在拥挤的市场中倚重相机规格
item.description: 中国硬件制造商 OPPO 周四发布了新款 Find X8 Ultra 旗舰手机，在中国高端品牌的相机技术军备竞赛中打响了最新一炮。【原文：Chinese hardware maker Oppo on Thursday unveiled its new Find X8 Ultra flagship phone, firing the latest salvo in a camera-technology arms race among premium Chinese brands.】

item.title: 市场破裂后英格兰银行停止出售长期债券
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发金边债券收益率飙升之后，英格兰银行屈服于市场压力，暂时停止出售其量化紧缩计划下的长期债券。【原文：The Bank of England has temporarily halted the sale of long-dated bonds under its quantitative tightening program, bowing to market pressure after a surge in gilt yields ignited by Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: Temu 取代 Allegro 成为波兰顶级电子商务平台
item.description: Temu 经过两年的扩张，并在营销方面投入巨资，已成为波兰访问量最大的电子商务平台，击败了本地市场 Allegro.eu SA。【原文：Temu has become the most visited e-commerce platform in Poland, dethroning local marketplace Allegro.eu SA after two years of expansion fueled by lavish spending on marketing.】

item.title: 美国贸易战加剧，中国大举采购巴西大豆
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级，购买美国农作物变得不可行，中国大豆压榨商本周抢购了大量巴西大豆。【原文：Chinese soybean crushers scooped up an unusually large amount of Brazilian beans this week as the escalating trade war makes purchases of US crops unviable.】

item.title: 铜业在智利峰会上对关税持悲观态度
item.description:
本周聚集在圣地亚哥的矿工们对贸易征税持观望态度。【原文：

Miners gathering in Santiago this week took a wait-and-see approach to trade levies.

】

item.title: 南非考虑将汽车业激励措施作为关税屏障
item.description: 南非贸易、工业和竞争部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）表示，南非正在考虑提供更多的激励措施来促进汽车生产，因为南非正在权衡抵消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战影响的措施。【原文：South Africa is considering offering additional incentives to boost car production, as it weighs measures to offset the impact of US President Donald Trump’s trade war, said Trade, Industry and Competition Minister Parks Tau.】

item.title: 新兴市场无一幸免于贸易战带来的美元债务损失
item.description: 没有一个新兴市场能幸免于贸易战的影响，迄今为止，每个国家的主权和企业美元债券都出现了亏损。【原文：No emerging market has been spared from the impact of the trade war, with sovereign and corporate dollar-denominated bonds of every country posting losses month to date.】

item.title: 这是否会成为 "特朗普套餐 "的回归？
item.description:
从交易所交易基金可以看出唐纳德-特朗普撤销关税后市场反弹的许多情况。【原文：

Looking at exchange-traded funds can tell us a lot about the market rebound following Donald Trump’s tariff reversal.

】

item.title: 意大利 Clessidra 公司考虑出售软件公司 Impresoft
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Clessidra Private Equity 正在权衡 Impresoft 的各种选择，包括出售这家估值约为 8 亿欧元（约合 8.85 亿美元）的软件公司。【原文：Clessidra Private Equity is weighing options for Impresoft, including a sale that could value the software firm at about €800 million ($885 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Meta 就联邦贸易委员会垄断案准备辩护
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）预告了 Meta 和美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）在法庭上的重要一天，这将对社交媒体巨头的未来产生重大影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner previews an important day in court for Meta and the FTC, with major implications for the future of the social media titan.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税和命令如何影响气候技术投资
item.description: 过去六个月，美国气候技术行业受到了极大的冲击，但该行业的风险投资却在不断增加。【原文：The last six months have given the US climate tech sector an extreme case of whiplash, yet venture funding to the industry is on the rise.】

item.title: 美国关税政策去向不明，前景扑朔迷离
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们要探讨的是在政策极度动荡时期进行预测所面临的挑战。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the challenge of forecasting at a time of extreme policy volatility. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 廉价消费品其实是美国梦
item.description:
特朗普的关税政策颠覆了政客与美国消费者之间近一个世纪的交易。【原文：

Trump’s tariffs upend a nearly century-old bargain between politicians and US consumers.

】

item.title: 特朗普 "鞭长莫及 "的关税延长了对全球贸易的拖累
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三撤销了对许多主要贸易伙伴提高关税的决定，这缓解了金融市场的恐慌情绪，但却几乎没有解决企业的困惑，他们不知道下一步会发生什么突变。【原文：President Donald Trump’s reversal of higher tariffs for many key trading partners Wednesday eased a sense of dread in financial markets but did little to address the cluelessness hanging over businesses wondering what abrupt change will come next.】

item.title: 提供大量加密货币杠杆的永续期货有望登陆美国
item.description: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统领导下的美国数字资产监管环境发生了巨大逆转，但世界上最受欢迎、风险最高的加密产品之一仍然不对美国人开放。【原文：Despite a dramatic reversal in the digital-asset regulatory environment in the US under President Donald Trump, one of the most-popular — and riskiest — crypto products in the world remains off-limits to Americans.】

item.title: 非法赌场和体育博彩公司攫取了美国最大的在线博彩收入
item.description: 根据 Yield Sec 的研究，非法体育博彩和赌场去年占据了美国在线博彩收入的 74%，通过积极的促销和产品，其业绩超过了获得许可的竞争对手。【原文：Illegal sports books and casinos took 74% of online gambling revenues in the US last year, outperforming licensed rivals through aggressive promotions and products, according to research from Yield Sec.】

item.title: 中东银行家期待贸易动荡后重现首次公开募股热潮
item.description: 四年来，中东地区一直是新股销售的亮点，但最近股市的波动和油价的暴跌使中东地区面临着巨大的挑战。尽管如此，银行家们仍对未来几周交易量的恢复抱有希望。【原文：The Middle East, a bright spot for new share sales for four years, faces a significant challenge from the recent volatility in equity markets and a slump in oil prices. Even so, bankers are hopeful that dealflow will resume in coming weeks.】

item.title: Alphabet 无法摆脱对人工智能的担忧，即使倍数很低
item.description: 对 Alphabet 公司在人工智能竞争中落后的持续担忧今年以来一直拖累着该公司的股价，即使是约两年来最便宜的盈利倍数或有限的关税风险也不足以吸引投资者。【原文：Persistent concerns that Alphabet Inc. has fallen behind in the artificial intelligence supremacy race has weighed on the stock this year, and not even the cheapest earnings multiple in about two years, or limited risk from tariffs, has been enough to entice investors.】

item.title: 公司削减 IT 开支，TCS 净收入低于预期
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）公布的第四季度盈利不及分析师预期，原因是全球地缘政治动荡导致企业削减信息技术支出。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. reported fourth-quarter earnings that missed analysts’ estimates after corporations curtailed spending on information technology amid global geopolitical tumult.】

item.title: 亚马逊首席执行官贾西在股东信中呼吁 "创业 "心态
item.description: 亚马逊公司首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）在致股东的年度信中表示，亚马逊公司必须像 "世界上最大的初创企业 "一样运营，努力满足人工智能的需求，并减少公司内部的官僚作风。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has to operate like the “world’s largest startup” as it works to meet demand for artificial intelligence and cut bureaucracy in its ranks, Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said in his annual letter to shareholders.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼将就银行观点接受参议院质询
item.description: 美国联邦储备局局长米歇尔-鲍曼将于周四在参议院银行委员会听证会上接受审查，议员们将审议她担任负责监管的副主席的提名。【原文：US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman is set to face scrutiny at a Senate Banking Committee hearing on Thursday as lawmakers consider her nomination to serve as vice chair for supervision.】

item.title: 欧盟将暂停对美国征收金属反关税 90 天
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上个月对欧盟出口的钢铁和铝产品征收了 25% 的关税，欧盟将推迟 90 天对美国征收反关税。【原文：The European Union will delay for 90 days the implementation of its counter tariffs against the US over the 25% duties President Donald Trump imposed last month on the bloc’s steel and aluminum exports.】

item.title: 债券守夜人亮相白宫
item.description:
特朗普的逆转提振了股票和债券，但时间可能不会太长

【原文：

Trump’s reversal lifts stocks and bonds, though maybe not for long

】

item.title: 塞尔维亚经济不景气但通胀高企仍维持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第七个月维持利率不变，原因是通胀率居高不下，即使经济在数月的反政府抗议活动后已失去动力。【原文：Serbia left interest rates unchanged for a seventh month due to sticky inflation even as the the economy lost steam following months of anti-government protests.】

item.title: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉公司首次入股美国天然气项目
item.description: 阿布扎比财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co. agreed to buy a stake in natural gas production and export projects in the US, weeks after the Middle Eastern emirate promised major investments in America.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长布洛克敦促耐心应对美国关税引发的波动
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）周四呼吁，在政策制定者努力应对美国新关税制度可能对全球供需产生的影响时，应保持耐心。【原文：Australia’s central bank chief Michele Bullock on Thursday called for patience as policymakers try to come to grips with how the new US tariff regime might affect global demand and supply.】
